PISTOL.strategy: **Apartments Rush**: All 5 players buy armor, rush apartments with coordinated pop-flashes. Clear balcony quickly, focus on overwhelming B site with trades.
**Banana Control**: 4 players banana with utility, 1 player apartments. Banana players use pop-flashes, fight for map control. Apps player makes noise then rotates.
**A Rush Long**: 3 players long A with armor, 2 players mid/short. Long players coordinate pop-flashes, rush site together. Mid players support or rotate.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid (1 with smoke), 2 players banana. Mid players smoke top mid, take control. Banana players create pressure but don't commit.
**A Split**: 2 players long A, 3 players mid to short. Long players smoke quad, mid players coordinate timing through short. Execute together.
**B Default**: 2 players apps, 2 players banana, 1 player mid. Play for picks and information. Banana players smoke car if CTs are aggressive.
**Short Rush**: 4 players mid to short with pop-flashes, 1 player banana. Short players coordinate utility, rush A site from short angle.
**Banana Fake to A**: 3 players make noise banana with utility, 2 players position mid. Once rotations happen, all execute A through short.
**Apps Control**: 3 players apartments with utility, 2 players banana. Apps players smoke balcony, take apps control. Play for picks.
**Anti-Stack**: 2 players long A, 2 players apps, 1 player mid. Create pressure from multiple angles. Mid player calls rotations based on sound.

ECO.strategy: **Five-Seven Apps Rush**: Everyone buys Five-Seven + armor. Rush apartments together with pop-flashes. Focus on close-range trades and weapon pickups.
**Stack Banana**: All 5 players stack banana area. Buy upgraded pistols + armor. Play close angles around car/logs, use pop-flashes for coordinated peeks.
**Mid Lurk**: 1 player lurks mid with upgraded pistol, 4 players force buy banana. Mid player waits for rotations, goes for late round picks.
**Deagle Long**: 2 players buy Deagle + armor long A, 3 players support with utility. Deagles take long angles pit/quad. Support players trade frag.
**Apps Control**: 4 players buy armor + upgraded pistols apps, 1 player saves. Apps players smoke balcony, fight for close-range duels.
**Anti-Force Banana**: 3 players buy armor + Five-Seven banana, 2 players save. Force players smoke car, play for picks, then save weapons.
**Short Contact**: 2 players buy armor + upgraded pistols mid/short, 3 players save. Short players go for aggressive contact with flashes.
**Banana Control**: 3 players buy armor + upgraded pistols banana, 2 players save. Banana players use pop-flashes, fight for map control.
**Split Save**: 2 players force long A, 2 players force apps, 1 player saves mid. Both sides play for picks, saver rotates to help.
**Full Save**: All players save completely. 2 long A, 2 apps, 1 mid. Play for exit frags and positioning for next round.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **A Control**: 3 players buy rifles, 2 players SMGs. 2 rifles long A, 1 rifle mid, SMGs support. Long rifles smoke quad, take site control.
**Banana Presence**: 2 rifles banana, 2 SMGs apps, 1 rifle mid. Banana rifles smoke car, take banana control. Create multi-angle pressure.
**Apps Take**: 2 rifles apps, 2 SMGs banana, 1 rifle mid. Apps rifles smoke balcony, clear apartments. Banana SMGs support or rotate.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 2 SMGs banana. Mid players smoke top mid, take control. Decide short execute timing.
**Pick Heavy**: Spread rifles for picks. 1 rifle long A, 1 rifle mid, 1 rifle banana, 2 SMGs floating. Play for economy upgrade.
**Long Focus**: 4 players long A (2 rifles, 2 SMGs), 1 rifle mid. Long players smoke quad, take A control. Mid rifle watches rotations.
**Short Split**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs long A, 1 rifle apps. Execute A split through short and long. Mid rifles smoke top mid.
**Anti-Full Buy**: 2 rifles long angles, 3 SMGs close angles. Rifles hold long A and banana, SMGs play close. Use utility to isolate duels.
**Balcony Control**: 2 rifles apps, 2 SMGs banana, 1 rifle mid. Apps rifles smoke balcony, take control. Banana SMGs support.
**Utility Heavy**: 2 rifles, 3 SMGs with heavy utility. Rifles take key angles, SMGs use smokes/flashes to support coordinated plays.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **A Execute**: Smoke quad + default, flash over smokes. 3 players long A, 2 players short. Execute A site with perfect utility timing and coordination.
**Banana Take**: 3 players banana with full utility, 2 players apps. Banana players smoke car + CT, molly sandbags. Take banana control with utility.
**B Split**: 2 players apps, 3 players banana to B. Smoke balcony + site, flash over smokes. Execute B split with coordinated timing.
**Mid Control**: 4 players mid, 1 player banana. Mid players smoke top mid + short, take control with flashes. Execute A through short.
**Default Setup**: 2 long A, 2 banana, 1 mid. AWPer banana or long, riflers support. Play for picks with utility. Execute based on information.
**A Fake to B**: 3 players make noise long A with utility, 2 players position apps. Once rotations happen, all 5 execute B through apps.
**Apps Execute**: 4 players apps with full utility, 1 player banana lurk. Apps players smoke balcony + newbox, execute B. Banana lurker watches rotations.
**Quad Control**: 3 players long A, 2 players mid. Long players smoke quad + default, take site control. Mid players support with utility.
**Anti-Stack B**: Heavy utility on apps (smokes + molotovs), 4 players execute B site. 1 player banana watches for rotations from A.
**Late Round A**: Play default until 30 seconds, then all 5 execute A through short. Use smokes + flashes for late round timing advantage.
